index.ourstory: We are living in unprecedented time. The Covid-19 pandemic had disrupted lives and businesses in a manner never seen before. At the height of the crisis, most countries 'locked down' or implement some sort of Movement Control Order(MCO) to try slow down the spread of the virus.
index.unikbiz: Unik BIZ is an app that allows any merchant who intend to advertise, sell or promote their business online.
index.unikid: Unik ID is an app that allows any merchant who intend to advertise, sell or promote their business online.
